forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. Southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the night, a gentle blanket of clouds veils the city, hinting at softness as the low temperature settles around 58 degrees. A light southwest breeze whispers through the streets, almost a promise of what lies ahead. As dawn breaks, the veil will gradually lift, revealing a pleasant Sunday marked by mostly sunny skies. Anticipate a high nearing 69 degrees, sweetly tempered by a playful west-southwest wind, which will pick up slightly as the day unfolds, pushing towards 14 mph with little bursts reaching 20 mph.

While the morning may retain a touch of the marine layer, by afternoon, this fog will recede, allowing for a clarity that invites you to revel in the sights of the iconic Golden Gate and the vibrant cityscape. With the pleasant temperatures and gentle breezes, dressing in layers will be your best strategy—perhaps a light sweater or jacket to transition from the coolness of the early hours to the warmth of midday. For a leisurely day, consider enjoying a stroll through the bustling streets of downtown San Francisco, perhaps stopping at an outdoor café to savor a cup of coffee while the city awakens around you. The tranquil beauty of the day awaits, filled with simple pleasures and the promise of a serene afternoon.
